statements: SELECT * FROM pedestrian_cyclist_safety;
SELECT id, location, safety_rating FROM pedestrian_cyclist_safety WHERE safety_rating > 3;
SELECT location, incident_date, safety_rating FROM pedestrian_cyclist_safety WHERE incident_type = 'Accident';
SELECT * FROM pedestrian_cyclist_safety ORDER BY incident_date DESC;
SELECT id, incident_type, location, incident_date FROM pedestrian_cyclist_safety WHERE safety_rating < 2 ORDER BY location ASC;
SELECT id, location, safety_rating FROM pedestrian_cyclist_safety WHERE safety_rating > 5 ORDER BY safety_rating DESC
SELECT * FROM pedestrian_cyclist_safety WHERE incident_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY incident_date ASC
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_incidents, incident_type FROM pedestrian_cyclist_safety GROUP BY incident_type ORDER BY total_incidents DESC
SELECT location, COUNT(*) AS total_incidents FROM pedestrian_cyclist_safety GROUP BY location HAVING total_incidents > 3 ORDER BY total_incidents DESC
SELECT id, location, safety_rating, incident_date, incident_type FROM pedestrian_cyclist_safety WHERE safety_rating < 3 AND incident_type='Crash' ORDER BY incident_date ASC
SELECT * FROM pedestrian_safety WHERE id = 1;
SELECT location, incident_date FROM pedestrian_safety WHERE incident_type = 'Accident';
SELECT * FROM cyclist_safety WHERE incident_type = 'Near Miss' ORDER BY incident_date DESC;
SELECT description FROM pedestrian_safety WHERE location LIKE '%crosswalk%';
SELECT location, incident_type FROM pedestrian_safety WHERE incident_date >= '2022-01-01' AND incident_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM pedestrian_safety WHERE incident_type='Accident' ORDER BY incident_date DESC;
SELECT location, incident_date FROM cyclist_safety WHERE location='Main Street' LIMIT 10;
SELECT id, location, incident_type FROM pedestrian_safety WHERE description LIKE '%injured%' ORDER BY location ASC, incident_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM cyclist_safety WHERE incident_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-08-31' AND incident_type='Collision' ORDER BY incident_date DESC;
SELECT id, location, incident_type, description FROM pedestrian_safety WHERE location='Park Avenue' AND incident_type='Near Miss';
SELECT * FROM PedestrianSafety LIMIT 5
SELECT ID, Location, IncidentType FROM CyclistSafety WHERE IncidentType = 'Accident'
SELECT Location, IncidentDateTime FROM PedestrianSafety ORDER BY IncidentDateTime DESC
SELECT ProjectName, ProjectStatus, ProjectBudget FROM UrbanPlanning WHERE ProjectStatus = 'Completed' ORDER BY ProjectBudget DESC
SELECT * FROM CyclistSafety WHERE IncidentType = 'Theft'
SELECT * FROM PedestrianSafety WHERE IncidentType = 'Accident' ORDER BY IncidentDateTime DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT Location, IncidentDateTime FROM PedestrianSafety WHERE IncidentType = 'Violation' AND Location LIKE '%Street%'
SELECT COUNT(*) AS TotalProjects, ProjectStatus FROM UrbanPlanning GROUP BY ProjectStatus HAVING TotalProjects > 5
SELECT DISTINCT Location FROM PedestrianSafety WHERE IncidentType = 'Near Miss' ORDER BY ID ASC
SELECT * FROM CyclistSafety JOIN PedestrianSafety ON CyclistSafety.Location = PedestrianSafety.Location
SELECT * FROM pedestrian_accidents;
SELECT accident_id, accident_date, location FROM cyclist_accidents;
SELECT location, severity FROM pedestrian_accidents WHERE severity = 'Fatal';
SELECT * FROM cyclist_injuries ORDER BY injury_date DESC;
SELECT injury_id, type FROM cyclist_injuries WHERE location LIKE '%city%';
SELECT * FROM pedestrian_accidents ORDER BY accident_date DESC, location ASC;
SELECT accident_id, accident_date, severity FROM cyclist_accidents WHERE severity = 'Severe';
SELECT location FROM pedestrian_injuries WHERE type = 'Fracture' ORDER BY location;
SELECT * FROM cyclist_injuries WHERE injury_date >= '2022-01-01' AND injury_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_pedestrian_accidents FROM pedestrian_accidents WHERE accident_date >= '2022-01-01' AND accident_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM PedestrianAccidents;
SELECT accident_id, accident_date, location FROM CyclistAccidents ORDER BY accident_date DESC;
SELECT area_name, area_population FROM UrbanAreas WHERE average_income > 50000;
SELECT report_date, reporter_name, report_description FROM AccidentReports WHERE report_type = 'Traffic';
SELECT measure_type, implementation_date FROM SafetyMeasures ORDER BY implementation_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM PedestrianAccidents ORDER BY accident_date DESC, location ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT report_date, reporter_name, report_type FROM AccidentReports WHERE report_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY reporter_name ASC;
SELECT area_name, area_population, average_income FROM UrbanAreas WHERE average_income > 50000 ORDER BY average_income DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM CyclistAccidents WHERE accident_type = 'Collision' OR accident_type = 'Fall' ORDER BY accident_date ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT measure_type, implementation_date FROM SafetyMeasures WHERE implementation_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2022-01-01' ORDER BY measure_type ASC;
